GK19bahcar8u:0: aṣṭama ucchvāsaḥ sahasā saṃpādayatā manorathaprārthitāni vastūni /
GK19bahcar8u:3: kasya na sukhāya bhavane bhavati mahāratnalābhaśca // 8.2 //
GK19bahcar8u:6: ekadā tu bhūpaterbhramata evāṭavikasāmantasya śarabhaketoḥ sūnurvyāghraketurnāma kuto 'pi
GK19bahcar8u:8: andhakāriṇīmakāraṇabhuvā bhrakuṭibhaṅgena triśākhena triśākhena triyāmāmiva sāhasasahacāriṇīṃ lalāṭasthalīṃ sadā samudvahantam,
GK19bahcar8u:9: avataṃsitaikaśukapakṣakaprabhāharitāyamānena pinaddhakācarakācamaṇikarṇikena śravaṇena śobhamānam, kiñciccullasya praviralapakṣmaṇaścakṣuṣaḥ sahajena rāgarociṣā rasāyanarasopayuktaṃ tārakṣavaṃ kṣatajamiva kṣarantam, avanāṭanāsikam cipiṭādharam,
GK19bahcar8u:13: anavaratakaṭhinakodaṇḍakuṇḍalīkaraṇakarkaśavyāyāmavistāritenāṃsalenorasā hasantamiva taṭaśilāprathimānaṃ vindhyagireḥ, ajagaragarīyasā ca bhujayugalena laghayantaṃ tuhinaśailaśāladrumāṇāṃ drāghimāṇam,
GK19bahcar8u:14: varāhabālavalitabandhanābhirnāgadamanajūṭikāvāṭikābhirjaṭilīkṛtapṛṣṭhe prakoṣṭhe pratiṣṭhāṃ gataṃ godantamaṇicitraṃ trāpuṣaṃ valayaṃ bibhrāṇam,
GK19bahcar8u:18: nālikulakālakambalalolalomnā pṛṣṭhabhāgabhājā bhasrābharaṇena pallavitamiva kārśyamupadarśayantam uttaratribhāgottaṃsitacāṣapicchacāruśikhare khadirajaṭānirmāṇe kharaprāṇe pracuramayūrapittapatralatācitritatvaci tvacisāraguṇe guruṇi vāmaskandhādhyāsitadhanuṣi doṣi lambamānenāvākśirasā śitaśarakṛttaikanalakavivarapraveśitetarajaṅgajanitasvastikabandhena bandhūkalohitarudhirarājirañjitaghrāṇavartmanā vapurvitativyaktavibhāvyamānakomalakroḍaromaśuklimnā śaśena śitāṭanīśikhāgragrathitagrīveṇa cāpāvṛtacañcūttānatāmratālunā tittiriṇā
GK19bahcar8u:19: varṇakamuṣṭimiva mṛgayāyāḥ, darśayantam, viṣamaviṣadūṣitavadanena ca vikarṇena kṛṣṇāhineva mūlagṛhītena vyagradakṣiṇakarāgram, jaṅgamamiva
GK19bahcar8u:24: phalamiṃva pāpasya, kāraṇamiva kalikālasya, kāmukamiva kālarātreḥ śabarayuvānamādāyājagāma
GK19bahcar8u:25: dūre ca sthāpayitvā vijñāpayāṃbabhūva--deva! sarvasyāsya vindhyasya svāmī
GK19bahcar8u:27: tasyāyaṃ nirghātanāmā svasrīyaḥ sakalasyāsya vindhyakāntārāraṇyasya parṇānāmapyabhijñaḥ kimuta pradeśānām /
GK19bahcar8u:29: iti kathite ca nirgātastu kṣititalanihitamauliḥ praṇāmamakarot /
GK19bahcar8u:31: avanipatistu saṃmānayansvayameva tamaprākṣīt--”aṅga! abhijñā yūyamasya sarvasyoddeśasya? vihāraśīlāśca divasaṣveteṣu bhavantaḥ? senāpatervānyasya vā tadanujīvinaḥ kasyacidudārarūpa nārī na gatā bhaveddarśanagocaram?' iti
GK19bahcar8u:33: darśitādaraṃ ca vyajñāpayat--”deva! prāyeṇātra hiraṇyo 'pi nāparigatāḥ saṃcaranti senāpateḥ, kuta eva nāryaḥ? nāpyevaṃrūpā kācidabalā /
GK19bahcar8u:34: tathāpi devādeśādidānīmanveṣaṇaṃ prati pratidinamananyakṛtyaiḥ kriyate yatnaḥ /
GK19bahcar8u:35: itaścārdhagavyūtimātra eva munimahite mahati mahīdharamālāmūlaruhi mahīruhāṃ ṣaṇḍe 'pi piṇḍapātī prabhūtāntevāsiparivṛtaḥ pārāśarī
GK19bahcar8u:36: divākaramitranāmā girinadīmāśritya prativasati, sa yadi vindedvārtām' iti
GK19bahcar8u:37: tacchru tvā narapatiracintayat--śrūyate hi tatrabhavataḥ sugṛhītanāmnaḥ
GK19bahcar8u:38: svargatasya grahavarmaṇo bālamitraṃ maitrāyaṇīyastrayīṃ vihāya brāhnaṇāyano vidvānutpannasamādhiḥ saugate mate yuvaiva kāṣāyāṇi
GK19bahcar8u:40: prāyaśaśca janasya janayati suhṛdapi dṛṣṭo bhṛśamāśvāsam /
GK19bahcar8u:43: bhagavatī ca vaidheye 'pi dharmagṛhiṇī garimāṇamāpādayati pravrajyā, kiṃ punaḥ sakalajanamanomuṣi viduṣi jane /
GK19bahcar8u:44: yato naḥ kutūhali hṛdayamabhūtsatatamasya darśanaṃ prati prāsaṅgikamevedamāpatitamatikalyāṇaṃ paśyāmaḥ prayatnaprārthitadarśanaṃ janamiti /
GK19bahcar8u:45: prakāśaṃ cābravīt--”aṅka! samupadiśa tamuddeśaṃ yatrāste sa piṇḍapātī' iti
GK19bahcar8u:47: atha krameṇa gacchata eva tasya anavakeśinaḥ kuḍmalitakarṇikārāḥ,
GK19bahcar8u:83: māṇikyamayā iva mahānīlatanavaḥ, timiramayā iva sakalajananayanamuṣaḥ,
GK19bahcar8u:85: vasantasya, añjanācalā iva pallavitāḥ, tanayā ivāṭavījātā vindhyasyādreḥ,
GK19bahcar8u:86: pātālāndhakārarāśaya iva bhittvā bhuvamutthitāḥ, pratipraveśikā iva varṣāvāsarāṇaām, aṃśāvatārā iva kṛṣṇārdharātrīṇām, indranīlamayāḥ prāsādā iva vanadevatānām, purastāddarśanapathamavaterustaravaḥ tato narapaterabhavanmanasyadūravartinā khalu bhavitavyaṃ bhadanteneti /
GK19bahcar8u:87: avatīrya ca girisariti samupaspṛśya yugapadviśrāmasamayasamunmuktaheṣāghoṣabadhirīkṛtāṭavīgahanāmasminneva pradeśe sthāpayitvā vājisenāmavalambya ca tapasvijanadarśanocitaṃ vinayaṃ hṛdayena dakṣiṇena ca hastena mādhavaguptamaṃse viralaireva rājabhiranugamyamānascaraṇābyāmeva prāvartata gantum atha teṣāṃ tarūṇāṃ madye nānādeśīyaiḥ sthānasthāneṣu sthāṇūnāśritaiḥ śilātaleṣūpaviṣṭairlatābhavanānyadhyāvasadbhiraraṇyānīnikuñjeṣu nilīnairviṭapacchāyāsu niṣaṇṇaistarumūlāni niṣevamāṇairvītarāgairārhatairmaskaribhiḥ śvetapaṭaiḥ pāṇḍurabikṣubhirbhāgavatairvarṇibiḥ keśaluñcanaiḥ kāpilairjainairlokāyatikaiḥ kāṇādairopaniṣadairaiśvarakāraṇikaiḥ kārandhamibhirdharmaśāstribhiḥ paurāṇikaiḥ sāptatantavaiḥ śābdikaiḥ pāñcarātrikairanyaiśca svānsvānsiddhāntāñśṛṇvadbhirabhiyuktaiścintayadbhisca pratyuccaradbhiśca saṃśayānaiśca niścinvadbhiśca vyutpādayadbhiśca
GK19bahcar8u:90: kurvāṇaistrisaraṇaparaiḥ paramopāsakaiḥ śukairapi śākyaśāsanakuśalaiḥ kośaṃ samupadiśadbhiḥ śikṣāpadopadeśadoṣopaśamaśālinībhiḥ śārikābhirapi dharmadeśānāṃ darśayantībhiranavarataśravaṇagṛhītālokaiḥ kauśikairapi bodhisattvajātakāni japadbhirjātasaugataśīlaśītalasvabhāvaiḥ śārdūlairapyamāṃsāśibhirupāsyamānam,
GK19bahcar8u:93: vāmakaratalaniviṣṭena nīvāramaśnatā pārāvatapotakena karṇotpaleneva priyāṃ maitrīṃ prasādayantam,
GK19bahcar8u:94: itarakarakisalayanakhamayūkhalekhābhirjanitajanavyāmoham, udgrīvaṃ mayūraṃ marakatamaṇikarakamiva vāridhārābhiḥ pūrayantam, itastataḥ pipīlakaśreṇīnāṃ śyāmākataṇḍulakaṇānsvayameva kirantam, aruṇena cīvarapaṭalena mradrīyasā saṃvītam, bahalabālātapānuliptamiva paurandaraṃ digbhāgam, ullikhitapajharāgaprabhāpratimayā raktāvadātayā dehaprabhayā
GK19bahcar8u:98: paramasaugatamapyavalokiteśvaram, askhalitamapi tapasi lagnam, ālokamiva yathāvasthitasakalapadārthaprakāśakaṃ
GK19bahcar8u:101: ātmano 'pi spṛhaṇīyamiva, dhyānasyāpi dhyeyamiva, jñānasyāpi jñeyamiva,
GK19bahcar8u:102: janma japasya, nemiṃ niyamasya, tattvaṃ tapasaḥ, śarīraṃ śaucasya, kośaṃ
GK19bahcar8u:103: kuśalasya, veśma viśvāsasya, sadvṛttaṃ sadvṛttatāyāḥ, sarvasvaṃ
GK19bahcar8u:104: sarvajñatāyāḥ, dākṣyaṃ dākṣiṇyasya, pāraṃ parānukampāyāḥ, nirvṛti
GK19bahcar8u:106: atipraśāntagambhīrākārāropitabahumānaśva sādaraṃ dūrādeva śirasā vacasā manasā ca vavande
GK19bahcar8u:107: divākaramitrastu maitrīmayaḥ prakṛtyā viśeṣatastenāpareṇādṛṣṭapūrveṇāmānuṣalokocitena sarvābhibhāvinā mahānubhāvābhogabhājā mrājiṣṇunā bhūpateraprākṛtenākāraviśeṣeṇa tena cābijātyaprakāśakena garīyasā praśrayeṇa cāhlāditaścakṣuṣi ca cetasi ca yugapadagrahīta /
GK19bahcar8u:109: kiñcidudgamanakena vilolaṃ vilambamānaṃ vāmāṃsāccīvarapaṭāntamutkṣipya cānekābhayadānadīkṣādakṣiṇo dakṣiṇaṃ mahāpuruṣalakṣaṇalekhāpraśastaṃ snigdhamadhurayā vācā sgauravamārogyadānena rājānamanvagrahīt abyanandacca svāgatagirā gurumivābyāgataṃ bahu manyamānaḥ svenāsanenāsaddvamatreti nimantrayāñcakāra
GK19bahcar8u:110: pārśvasthitaṃ ca śiṣyamabravīt--”āyuṣn! upānaya kamaṇḍalunā pādodakam' iti
GK19bahcar8u:112: sthāne khalu tatrabhavānguṇānurāgī grahavarmā bahuśo varṇitavānasya guṇān'
GK19bahcar8u:114: prakāśaṃ cābabhāṣe--”bhagavan! bhavaddarśanapuṇyānugṛhītasya mama punarukta ivāyamāryaprayuktaḥ pratibhātyanugrahaḥ /
GK19bahcar8u:116: atibhūmirbhūmirevāsanaṃ bhavādṛśāṃ puraḥ saṃbāṣaṇā mṛtābhiṣekaprakṣālitasakalavapuṣaśca me pradeśavṛttiḥ /
GK19bahcar8u:121: śilābhāraḥ' ityākalayya punaḥ punarabyarthyamāno 'pi yadā na pratyapadyata
GK19bahcar8u:122: pārthivo vacanaṃ tadā svamevāsanaṃ punarapi bheje bhadantaḥ /
GK19bahcar8u:123: bhūpatimukhanalinanihitanibhṛtanayanayugalanigaḍaniścalīkṛtahṛdayasca sthitvā kāñcitkālakalāṃ kalikālakalmaṣakāluṣyamiva kṣālayannamalābhirdantamayūkhamālābhirmūlaphalābyavahārasaṃbhavamudvamanniva ca parimalasubagaṃ vikacakusumapaṭalapāṇḍuraṃ
GK19bahcar8u:126: ki nāma nālokyate jīvadbhiradbhutaṃ yena rūpamacintatopanatamidaṃ dṛkpathamupagatam /
GK19bahcar8u:128: ihāpi janmani dattamevāsmākamamunā tapaḥkleśena phalamasulabhadarśanaṃ darśayatā devānāṃpriyam
GK19bahcar8u:131: mahadbhiḥ puṇyairvinā na viśrāmyanti sajjane tvādṛsi dṛśaḥ /
GK19bahcar8u:138: yatsatyaṃ mumukṣorapi me puṇyabhājamālokya punaḥ śraddhā jātā manujajanmani /
GK19bahcar8u:141: adya saphalaṃ janma pādapānāṃ yeṣāmasi gato gocaram /
GK19bahcar8u:143: asyatvīdṛśe śaiśave vinayasyopādhyāyaṃ dhyāyannapi na saṃbhāvayāmi bhuvi /
GK19bahcar8u:145: dhanyaḥ sa bhūbhṛdyasya vaṃśe maṇiriva muktāmayaḥ saṃbhūto 'si /
GK19bahcar8u:146: evaṃvidhsva ca puṇyavataḥ kathañcitprāptasya kena priyaṃ samācarāma iti pāriplavaṃ ceto naḥ
GK19bahcar8u:147: sakalavanacarasārthadhāraṇasya kandamūlaphalasya girisaridambhaso vā ke vayam /
GK19bahcar8u:152: yadi ca noparuṇaddhi kañcatkāryalavamarakṣaṇīyākṣaraṃ vā kathanīyaṃ tatkathayatu bhavān sa śrotumabhilaṣati hṛdayaṃ sarvamidaṃ naḥ /
GK19bahcar8u:154: kiyadavadhirvāyaṃ śūnyāṭavīparyaṭanavaleśaḥ kalyāṇarāśeḥ? kasmācca saṃtaptarūpeva te tanuriyamasaṃtāpārhā vibhāvyate?' iti /
GK19bahcar8u:155: rājā tu sādarataramabravīt--”ārya! darśitasaṃbhrameṇānena madhurasavisaramamṛtamiva hṛdayadhṛtikaramanavarataṃ varṣatā vacasaiva te
GK19bahcar8u:159: mama hi vinaṣṭanikhileṣṭabandhorjīvitānubandhasya nibandhanamekaiva yavīyasī svasāvaśeṣā /
GK19bahcar8u:164: atastāmanveṣṭuṃ vayamaniśaṃ niśi niśi ca satatamimāmaṭavīmaṭāmaḥ /
GK19bahcar8u:165: na caināmāsādayāmaḥ kathayatu ca gururapi yadi kadācitkutaścidvane carataḥ śrutipathamupagatā tadvārtā' iti /
GK19bahcar8u:166: atha tacchutvā jātodvega iva bhadantaḥ punarabhyadhāt--”dhīman! na khalu kaścidevaṃrūpo vṛttānto 'smānupāgatavān /
GK19bahcar8u:168: ityevaṃ bhā,māṇa iva tasminnakasmādāgtayāparaḥ śamini vayasi vartamānaḥ saṃbhrāntarūpa iva purastāduparacitāñjalirjātakaruṇaḥ
GK19bahcar8u:170: bālaiva ca balavadvyasanābibhūtā bhūtapūrvāpi kalyāṇarūpā strośokāveśavivaśā vaiśvānaraṃ viśati
GK19bahcar8u:175: rājā tu jātānujāśahkaḥ sodaryasnehāccāntardruta iva duḥkhena dodūyamānahṛdayaḥ kathamapi gadgadikāgṛhītakaṇṭho vikalavāgbāṣpāyamāṇadṛṣṭiḥ papraccha--”pārāśarin! kiyaddūre sā yoṣidevañjātīyā dīvedvā kālametāvantamiti /
GK19bahcar8u:176: pṛṣṭā vā tvayā bhadre! kāsi, kasyāsi, kuto 'si, kimarthaṃ
GK19bahcar8u:177: vanamidamabhyupagatāsi, viśasi ca kiṃnimittamanalam? ityāditaśca prabhṛti kārtsnyena kathyamānamicchāmi śrotuṃ kathamāryasya gatā darśanagocaramākārato vā kīdṛśo' iti /
GK19bahcar8u:178: tathābhihitastu bhūbhujā bhikṣurājajakṣe--”mahābhāga! śrūyatām--ahaṃ hi pratyuṣasyevādya vanditvā bhagavantamanenaiva nadīrodhasā saikatasukumāreṇayaducchayā vihṛtavānatidūram /
GK19bahcar8u:179: ekasmiṃñca vanalatāgahane girinadīsamīpabhāji bhramarīṇāmiva himahatakamalākarakātarāṇāṃ rasitaṃ sāryamāṇānāmatitāratānavartinīnāṃ vīṇātantrīṇāmiva jhāṅkāramekatānaṃ nārīṇāṃ ruditamadhṛtikaramatikaruṇamākarṇitavānasmi samupajātakṛpaśca gato 'smi taṃ pradeśam /
GK19bahcar8u:180: dṛṣṭavānasmi ca dṛṣtkhaṇḍakhaṇḍitāṅguligalallohitena ca pārṣṇipraviṣṭaśaraśalākāśalyaśūlasaṃkocitacakṣuṣā cādhvanīnaśramaśvayathuniścalacaraṇena ca sthāṇavavraṇavyathitagurphabaddhabhūrjatvacā ca vātakhuḍakhedakhañjajaṅghājātajvareṇa ca pāṃsupāṇḍurapicchakena ca kharjūrajūṭajaṭājarjaritajānunā ca śatāvarīvidāritoruṇā ca vidārīdāritatanudukūlapallavena cotkaṭavaṃśaviṭapakaṇṭakakoṭipāṭitakañcukakarpaṭena sa
GK19bahcar8u:181: phalalobhāvalambitānamrabadarīlatājālakairutkaṇṭakairullikhitasukumārakarodareṇa ca kuraṅgaśṛṅgotkhātaiḥ kandamūlaphalaiḥ kadarthitabāhunā tāmbūlavirahavirasamukhakhaṇḍitakomalāmalakīphalena kuśakusumāhatilohitānā śvayathumatāmakṣṇāṃ lepīkṛtamanaḥśilena ca kaṇṭakilatālūnālakalatena ca kenacitkisalayopapāditātapatrakṛtyena kenacitkadalīdalavyajanavāhinā kenacitkamalinīpalāśapuṭagṛhītāmbhasā kenacitpātheyīkṛtamṛṇālapūlikena kenaciccīnāṃśukadaśāśikyānihitanālikerakośakalaśīkalitasaralatailena,
GK19bahcar8u:182: katipayāvaśeṣaśokavikalamūkakubjavāmanabadhirabarbarāviralenābalānāṃ cakravālena parivṛtām, āpatkāle 'pi kulodgatenevāmucyamānāṃ prabhālepinā lāvaṇyena, pratibimbitairāsannavanalatākisalayaiḥ
GK19bahcar8u:186: mukhamudvahantīm, ākāśamapi śūnaytayātiśayānām, mṛnmayīmiva niścetanatayā marunmayīmiva niḥśvāsasaṃpadā pāvakamayīmiva saṃtāpasaṃtānena salilamayīmivāśruprasravaṇena viyanmayīmiva niravalambanatayā taḍinmayīmiva pāriplavatayā śabdamayīmiva paridevitavāṇībāhulyena muktamuktāṃśukaratnakusumakanakapatrābharaṇāṃ kalpalatāmiva mahāvane
GK19bahcar8u:193: nimagnām, praviṣṭāṃ vanagahanaṃ dhyānaṃ ca, sthitā tarutale maraṇe ca patitāṃ dhātryutsa ṅge mahānarthe ca, dūrīkṛtāṃ bhartrā sukhena ca,
GK19bahcar8u:194: virecitāṃ bhramaṇenāyuṣā ca, ākulāṃ keśakalāpena maraṇopāyena ca,
GK19bahcar8u:196: ca, dhṛtamukhīṃ pāṇinā maunena ca, gṛhītāṃ priyasakhījanena manyunā ca,
GK19bahcar8u:197: tathā ca bhraṣṭairbandhubhirvilāsaiśca, muktena śravaṇayugalenātmanā ca,
GK19bahcar8u:199: caraṇalagnābhiḥ, paricārikābhirdarbhāṅku rasūcībhiśca, hṛdayavinihitena cakṣuṣā priyeṇa ca, dīrghaiḥ śokasvasitaiḥ keśeśca, kṣīṇena vapuṣā puṇyena
GK19bahcar8u:200: ca pādayoḥ patantobirvṛddhābhiraśruvārābhiśca, svalpāvaśeṣeṇa parijanena jovitena ca, alasāmutmeṣe, dakṣāmaśrumokṣe, saṃtatāṃ cintāsu,
GK19bahcar8u:201: vicchinnāmāśāsu, kṛsāṃ kāye, sthūlāṃ śvasite, pūritāṃ duḥkhena, riktā
GK19bahcar8u:202: sattvena, adhyāsitāmāyāsena, śūnyāṃ hṛdayena, niscalāṃ niscayena, calitāṃ
GK19bahcar8u:203: dhairyāt, api ca vasatiṃ vyasanānām, ādhānamādhīnām,
GK19bahcar8u:205: abhiyogamabhāgyānām, udvegamudvegānām, kāraṇaṃ karuṇāyāḥ, pāraṃ parāyattatāyā yoṣitam /
GK19bahcar8u:207: sā tu samīpagate mayi tadavasthāpi sabahumānamānatamauliḥ praṇatavatī /
GK19bahcar8u:213: itītarastrīsamucitam, “āyuṣmati' ityavasthāyāmapriyam, “kalyāṇini' iti daśāyāṃ viruddham, “candramukhi' ityamunimatam, “bāle' ityagauravopetam,
GK19bahcar8u:214: “ārye' iti jarāropaṇam “puṇyavati' iti phalaviparītam, “bhavati' iti sarvasādhāraṇam /
GK19bahcar8u:215: api ca “kāsi' ityanabhijātam, kimarthaṃ rodiṣi' iti
GK19bahcar8u:216: duḥkhakāraṇasmaraṇakāri, “mā rodīḥ' iti śokahetumanapanīya na śobhate,
GK19bahcar8u:217: “samāsvasihi' iti kimāśritya, “svāgatam' iti yātayāmam, “sukhamāsyate' iti mityā /
GK19bahcar8u:218: ityevaṃ cintayatyeva mayi tasmātstraiṇādutthāyānyatarā yoṣidāryarūpeva śokaviklavā samupasṛtya katipayapalitaśāraṃ śiro nītvā mahītalamatulahṛdayasaṃtāpasūcakairaśrubindubhiscaraṇayugalaṃ dahantī mamātikṛpaṇairakṣaraiśca hṛdayamabhihitavatī--”bhagavan!
GK19bahcar8u:224: prāṇarakṣaṇācca na paraṃ puṇyajātaṃ jagati gīyate janena /
GK19bahcar8u:227: yata iyaṃ naḥ svāminī maraṇena piturabhāvena bhartṛḥ pravāsena ca bhrātuḥ bhraṃśena ca śeṣasya bāndhavavargasyātimṛduhṛdayatayānapatyatayā ca
GK19bahcar8u:228: niravalambanā, paribhavena ca nīcārātikṛtena, prakṛtimanasvinī amunā ca
GK19bahcar8u:233: gurujanamanunayantīrakhaṇḍitapraṇayā narmasvapi samavadhīrya priyasakhīrvijñāpayantamaśaraṇamanāthamaśruvyākulanayanamaparibhūtapūrvaṃ manasāpi paribhūya bhṛtyavargamagniṃ praviśati /
GK19bahcar8u:240: mama hi gururapara iva bhagavānsugataḥ samīpagata eva /
GK19bahcar8u:242: duḥkhāndhakārapaṭalabhiduraiśca saugataiḥ subhāṣitaiḥ svakīyaiśca darśitanidarśanairnānāgamagurubhirgirāṃ kauśalaiḥ kuśalaśīlāmenāṃ
GK19bahcar8u:244: tacca śrutvā “tvaratāmāryaḥ' ityabhidadhānā sā punarapi pādayoḥ patitavatī /
GK19bahcar8u:247: svasurnāmni niṃmnīkṛtamanā manyunā sarvākārasaṃvādinyā daśayaiva dūrīkṛtasaṃdeho dagdha iva sodaryāvasthāśravaṇena śravaṇayoḥ śramaṇācāryamuvāca--”ārya! niyataṃ saiveyamanāryasyāsya janasyātikaṭhinahṛdayasyātinṛśaṃsasya mandabhāgyasyabhaginī bhāgadheyairetāmavasthāṃ nītā niṣkāraṇavairibhirvarākī vidīryamāṇaṃ me hṛdayamevaṃ nivedayati' ityuktvā tamapi śramaṇamabyadhāt--”ārya! uttiṣṭa /
GK19bahcar8u:249: yatasva prabhūtaprāṇaparitrāṇapuṇyopārjanāya yāmaḥ, yadi kathañcijjīvantīṃ saṃbhāvayāmaḥ' iti bhāṣamāṇa evottasthau /
GK19bahcar8u:250: atha samagraśiṣyavarghānugatenācāryeṇa turagebhyaścāvatīrya samastena sāmantalokena paścādākṛṣyamāṇāśvīyenānugamyamānaḥ purastācca tena śākyaputrīyeṇa pradiśyamānavartmā padbhyāmeva taṃ pradeśamaviralaiḥ padaiḥ pibannivaprāvartata /
GK19bahcar8u:251: krameṇa ca samīpamupagataḥ śuśrāva latāvanāntaritasya mumūrṣormahataḥ straiṇasya tatkālocitānanekaprakārānālāpān--”bhagavandharma! dhāva śīghram /
GK19bahcar8u:253: devi dharaṇi, dhīrayasi na dukhitāṃ duhitaram /
GK19bahcar8u:254: vka nu khalu proṣitā puṣpabhūtikuṭumbinī lakṣmīḥ /
GK19bahcar8u:255: anāthāṃ nātha mukharavaśyavividhādhividhurāṃ vadhūṃ vidhavāṃ vibodhayasi kimiti nemām /
GK19bahcar8u:261: prayatnarakṣita kṛtaghna cāritracaṇḍāla, na rakṣasi rājaputrīm /
GK19bahcar8u:263: hā devi duhitṛsnehamayi yaśomati, maṣitāsi dagdhadhavadasyunā /
GK19bahcar8u:266: mahārāja rājyavardhana, na dhāvasi mandībhūtā bhaginīprītiḥ /
GK19bahcar8u:268: vyapehi pāpa pāvaka strīghātanirghṛṇa, jvalanna lajjase /
GK19bahcar8u:270: saṃvādaya drutaṃ devīdāhaṃ devāya duḥkhitajanātiharāya harṣāya /
GK19bahcar8u:273: vijane vane kamākrandāmi kasmai kathayāmi, kamupayāmi śaraṇam, kāṃ diśaṃ pratipadye, karomi kimabhāgadheyā /
GK19bahcar8u:279: sthāsyasi kathamivāśive śavaśibire śabarike sutanu tanūnapāti patiṣyasi tvamapi /
GK19bahcar8u:287: menake, janmani janmani devīdāsyameva dadātu devo devaṃ dahandahanaḥ /
GK19bahcar8u:302: pādayoḥ patati te tāmbūlavāhinī bahumatā rājaputri, patralatā /
GK19bahcar8u:324: maraṇasamaye kasmāllavalike, halahalako balīyānānandamayo hṛdayasya me /
GK19bahcar8u:327: vṛthā virasasi vayasya vāyasa, vṛkṣe kṣīriṇi kṣaṇe kṣaṇe kṣīṇapuṇyāyāḥ puraḥ /
GK19bahcar8u:334: ālalambe ca mūrcchāmīlitalocanāyā lalāṭaṃ hastena tasyāḥ sasaṃbhramam /
GK19bahcar8u:335: atha tena bhrātuḥ preyasaḥ prakoṣṭhabaddhānāmoṣadhīnāṃ rasavirasamiva pratyujjīvanakṣamaṃ kṣaratā vamateva pārihāryamaṇīnāmacintyaṃ prabāvamamṛtamiva nakhacandraraśmibhirudgiratā badhnateva candrodayacyutaśiśiraśīkaraṃ candrakāntacūḍāmaṇiṃ mūrdhani mṛṇālamayāṅgulinevātiśītalena nirvāpayatā dahyamāma hṛdayapratyānayateva kuto 'pi jīvitamāhlādakena hastasaṃsparśena sahasaiva samunmimīla rājyaśrīḥ /
GK19bahcar8u:336: tathā cāsaṃbhāvitāgamanasyācintitadarśanasya sahasā prāptasya bhrātuḥ svapnadṛṣṭadarśanasyeva kaṇṭhe samāśliṣya tatkālāvirbhāvanirbhareṇābhibhūtasarvātmanā duḥkhasaṃbhāreṇa nirdayaṃ nadīmukhapraṇālābyāmivamuktābhyāṃ sthūlapravāhamutsṛjantī bāṣpavāri vilocanābhyām “hā tāta, hā amba hā sakhyaḥ' iti vyāharantī,
GK19bahcar8u:337: muhurmuhuruccaistarāṃ ca samudbhūtabhaginīsnehasadbhāvabhārabhāvitamanyunā muktakaṇṭhamaticiraṃ vikruśya “vatse, sthirā bhava tvam' iti bhrātrā karasthagitamukhī samāśvāsyamānāpi, “kalyāṇini, kuru vacanamagrajasya guroḥ' ityācāryeṇa yācyamānāpi, devi, na paśyasi devasyāvasthām /
GK19bahcar8u:342: dṛḍhaṃ dūyate deva' iti sakhībhiranunīyamānāpi, cira
GK19bahcar8u:344: prabhūtamanyubhārabharitāntaḥkaraṇā karuṇaṃ kāhalena svareṇa katicitkālamatidīrghaṃ ruroda
GK19bahcar8u:345: vigate ca manyuvege vahneḥ samīpādākṣipya bhrātā nītā nikaṭavartini tarutale niṣasāda /
GK19bahcar8u:346: śanairācāryastu tathā harṣa iti vijñāya vivardhitādaraḥ sutarāṃ muhūrtamivātivāhya nibhṛtasaṃjñājñāpitena śiṣyeṇopanītaṃ nalinīdalaiḥ svayamevādāya namro mukhaprakṣālanāyodakamupaninye /
GK19bahcar8u:349: prakṣālitamukhaśaśini ca mahīpāle sarvato niḥśabdaḥ saṃbabhūvasakalo likhita iva lokaḥ /
GK19bahcar8u:351: eṣa te bharturhṛdayaṃ dvitīyamasmākaṃ ca guruḥ' iti /
GK19bahcar8u:352: rājavacanāttu rājaduhitari patiparicayaśravaṇodghātena punarānītanetrāmbhasi namantyāmācāryaḥ prayatnarakṣitāgamāgatabāṣpāmbhaḥsaṃbhārabhajyamānadhairyārdralocanaḥ kiñcitparāvṛttanayano dīrghaṃ niḥśaśvāsa /
GK19bahcar8u:353: smitvā ca kṣaṇamekaṃ pradarśitapraśrayo mṛduvādī madhurayā vācā
GK19bahcar8u:357: snātvā ca gamyatā tāmeva bhūyo bhuvam' iti /
GK19bahcar8u:358: atha bhūpatiranuvartamāno laukikamācāramācāryavacanaṃ cotthāya snātvā girisariti saha svasrā tāmeva bhūmiptayāsīt /
GK19bahcar8u:359: tasyāṃ ca saparijanāṃ prathamamāhitāvadhānaḥ pārśvavartī paravatīṃ śucā patipiṇḍapradarśitaprayatnapratipannābhyavahārakāraṇāṃ bhaginīmabhojayat /
GK19bahcar8u:361: bhuktavāṃśca bandhanātprabhṛti vistarataḥ svasuḥ kānyakubjād gauḍasaṃbhramaṃ guptito guptanāmnā kulaputreṇa niṣkāsanaṃ nirgatāyāśca rājyavardhanamaraṇaśravaṇaṃ śrutvā cāhāranirākaraṇamanāhāraparāhatāyāśca vindhyāṭavīparyaṭanakhedaṃ jātanirvedāyāḥ pātrakapraveśopakramaṇaṃ yāvatsarvamaśṛṇodvyatikaraṃ parijanataḥ /
GK19bahcar8u:362: tataḥ sukhāsīnamekatra tarutale viviktabhuvi bhaginīdvitīyaṃ dūrasthitānujīvijanaṃ rājānamācāryaḥ samupasṛtya śanairāsāṃcakre /
GK19bahcar8u:363: sthitvā ca kañcitkālāṃśaṃ leśato vaktumupacakrame--”śrīman! ākarṇyatām /
GK19bahcar8u:364: ākhyeyamasti naḥ kiñcit-- ayaṃ hi yauvanaunmādātparibhūya bhūyasīrbhāryā yauvanāvatārataralatarāstārārājo rajanīkarṇapūraḥ purā puruhūtapurodhaso dhiṣaṇasya purandhrīṃ dharmapatnīṃ patnīyannatitaralastārāṃ nāmāpajahāra /
GK19bahcar8u:366: cakitacakoralocanayā ca tayā sahātikāmayā sarvākārābhirāmayā ramamāṇo ramaṇīyeṣu deśeṣu cacāra
GK19bahcar8u:367: cirācca kathañcitsarvagīrvāṇavāṇīgauravād girāṃ patyuḥ punaripa pratyarpayāmāsa tām /
GK19bahcar8u:369: ekadā tu śailādudayādadayamāno vimale vāriṇi varuṇālayasya saṃkrāntamātmanaḥ pratibimbaṃ vilokitavān
GK19bahcar8u:370: dṛṣṭvā ca tattadā sasmaraḥ sasmāra smeragaṇḍasthalasya tārāyā mukhasya /
GK19bahcar8u:374: tāsāṃ ca kukṣikoṣeṣu muktāphalībhūtānavāpa tānkathamapi rasātalanivāsī vāsukirnāma viṣamucāmīśaḥ
GK19bahcar8u:375: sa ca tairmuktāphalaiḥ pātālatale 'pi tārāgaṇamiva darśayadbhirekāvalīmakalpayat /
GK19bahcar8u:377: sā ca bhagavataḥ somasya sarvāsāmoṣadhīnāmadhipateḥ prabhāvādatyantaviṣaghnī himāmṛtasaṃbhavatvācca sparśena sarvasattvasaṃtāpahāriṇī babhūva /
GK19bahcar8u:378: yataḥ sa tāṃ sarvadā viṣoṣmaśāntaye vāsukiḥ paryadhatta /
GK19bahcar8u:379: samatikrāmati ca kiyatyapi kāle kadācinnāmaikāvalīṃ tasmānnāgarājānnāgārjuno nāma nāgairevānītaḥ pātālatalaṃ bhikṣurabhikṣata lebhe ca /
GK19bahcar8u:380: nirgatya ca rasātalāttrisamudrādhipataye sātavāhananāmne narendrāya suhṛde sa dadau tām /
GK19bahcar8u:381: sā cāsmākaṃ kālena śiṣyaparamparayā kathamapi hastamupagatā /
GK19bahcar8u:382: yadyapi ca paribhava iva bhavati bhavādṛśāṃ dattrima upacārastathāpyoṣadhibuddhyā buddhimatā sarvasattvarāśirakṣāpravṛttena rakṣaṇīyaśarīreṇāyuṣmatā viṣarakṣāpekṣayā gṛhyatām' ityabhidhāya bhikṣorabhyāśavartinaścīvarapaṭāntasaṃyatāṃ mumoca tāmekāvalīṃ mandākinīm /
GK19bahcar8u:383: unmucyamānāyā eva yasyāḥ prabhālepini labdhāvakāśe viśadamahasi mahīyasi visarpati raśmimaṇḍale yugapaddhavalāyamāneṣu diṅmukeṣu mukulitalatāvadhūtkaṇṭhitairāmūlādvikasitamiva tarubhiḥ,
GK19bahcar8u:384: abhinavamṛṇālalubdhairdhāvitamiva dhutapakṣapuṭapaṭaladhavalitagaganaṃ vanasarasīhaṃsayūthaiḥ, sphuṭitamiva bharavaśaviśīryamāṇadhūlidhavalairgarbhabhedasūcitasūcīsaṃcayaśucibhiḥ ketakīvāṭeḥ, uddalitadanturābiḥ prabuddhamiva kumudinībhiḥ,
GK19bahcar8u:391: aparatārāgaṇalobhamuditenoditamiva vikacamarīcicakrāntakakubhā pūrṇacandreṇa, prakṣālita iva dāvānaladhūlidhūsaritadiganto divasaḥ,
GK19bahcar8u:393: rājā tu māṃsalaistasyāḥ saṃmukhairmayūkhairākulīkriyamāṇaṃ muhurmuhurunmīlayannimīlayaṃśca cakṣuḥ kathamapi prayatnena dadarśa sarvāśāpūraṇīṃ paṅktīkṛtāmiva diṅnāgakaraśīkarasaṃhatim, ghanamuktāṃ śāradīmiva lekhīkṛtāṃ jyotsnām, prakaṭapadakacihnāṃ saṃcāravīthīmiva bālendorniścalībhūtāṃ saptarṣimālāmiva hastamuktām,
GK19bahcar8u:395: dhavalatāguṇaparigṛhītāṃ kāntimiva nirgatāṃ kṣīrarāśeḥ anekamahāmahībhṛtparamparāgatāṃ gaṅgāmiva
GK19bahcar8u:403: ācāryastu tāmuddhṛtya babandha bandhure skandhabhāge bhūpateḥ /
GK19bahcar8u:407: ke ca vayamidānīmātmano 'pi kimuta grahaṇasya pratyākhyānasya vā /
GK19bahcar8u:411: samatikrānte ca kiyatyapi kāle gate caikāvalīvarṇanālāpe lokasyānantaraṃ labdhaviśrambhā rājyaśrīstāmbūlavāhinīṃ patralatāmāhūyopāṃśukimapi sarṇamūle śanairādideśa /
GK19bahcar8u:412: darśitavinayā ca patralatā pārthivaṃ vyajñāpayat--”deva! devī vijñāpayati na smarāmyāryasya puraḥ kadāciduccairvacanamapi /
GK19bahcar8u:414: iyaṃ hi śucāmasahyatāṃ vyāpārayantī hatadaivadattā ca daśā śithilayati vinayam /
GK19bahcar8u:420: athācāryaḥ sudhīramabhyadhāt--”āyuṣmati! śoko hi nāma paryāyaḥ piśācasya,
GK19bahcar8u:421: rūpāntaramākṣepasya, tāruṇyaṃ tamasaḥ, viśeṣaṇaṃ viṣasya, anantakaḥ
GK19bahcar8u:428: tadasyājasrāsrasrāviṇo hṛdayamahāvraṇasya bahaladoṣāndhakāralabdhapraveśaprasarasya prāṇataskarasya śūnyatāhetormahābhūtagrāmaghātakasya sakalavigrahakṣapaṇadakṣasya doṣacakravartinaḥ kārśyaśvāsapralāpopadravabahalasya dorgharogasyāsadgrahasya sakalalokakṣayadhūmaketorjīvitāpahāradakṣasyākṣaṇaruceranabhravajragātasya sphuradanavadyavidyāvidyudvidyotamānāni gahanagrandhagūḍhagarbhagrahaṇagambhīrāṇi bhūrikāvyakathākaṭhorāṇi
GK19bahcar8u:429: bahuśākhodvahanabṛhanti viduṣāmapi hṛdayāni nālaṃ soḍhumāpātaṃ kimuta navamālikākusumakomalānāṃ sarasabisatantudurbalakamabalānāṃ hṛdayam /
GK19bahcar8u:430: evaṃ sati satyavrate! vada kimatra kriyate, katama upālabhyate, kasya pura uccairākradyante, hṛdayadāhi duḥkhaṃ vā khyāpyate? sarvamakṣiṇo nimolya soḍhavyamamūḍhena martyadharmaṇā puṇyavati! purātanyaḥ sthitaya etāḥkena śakyante 'nyathākartum /
GK19bahcar8u:433: kṣaṇamapi kṣamamāṇā galantyāyuṣkalākalanakuśalā nilaye nilaye kālanālikāḥ
GK19bahcar8u:434: jagati sarvajantujīvitopahārapātinī saṃcarati jhaṭiti caṇḍikā yamājñā /
GK19bahcar8u:436: pratidiśaṃ paryaṭanti peṭakaiḥ prataptalohalohitākṣāḥ kālakūṭakāntikālakāyāḥ kālapāśapāṇayaḥ kālapuruṣāḥ /
GK19bahcar8u:438: diśi diśi vahanti bahucitādhūmadhūsaritapretapatipatākāpaṭupatitagṛdhradṛṣṭayaḥ śokakṛtakolāhalakulakuṭumbinīvikīrṇakeśakalāpaśabalaśavaśibikāsahasrasaṃṅkulāḥ kilakilāyamānaśmaśānaśiviraśivāśāvakāḥ paralokāvasathapathikasārthaprasthānaviśikhā vīthayaḥ sakalalokakavalāvalehalampaṭā bahalā vahaṃlihā leḍhi lohitācitā citāṅgārakālī kālarātrijihvā jīvitāni jīvinām /
GK19bahcar8u:439: tṛptamaśikṣitā ca bhagavataḥ sarvabhūtabhujo bubhukṣā mṛtyoḥ /
GK19bahcar8u:446: evamavadhṛtya nātyarthamevārhasi medhāvini mṛduni manasi tamasaḥ prasaraṃ dātum /
GK19bahcar8u:448: api ca dūragate 'pi hi śoke nanvidānīmapekṣaṇīya evāyaṃ jyeṣṭhaḥ pitṛkalpo
GK19bahcar8u:450: itarathā ko na bahu manyeta kalyāṇarūpamīdṛsaṃ saṃkalpamatrabhavatyāḥ kāṣāyagrahaṇakṛtam /
GK19bahcar8u:455: yadi bhrāteti yadi jyeṣṭha iti yadi vatsa iti yadi guṇavāniti yadi rājeti sarvathā sthātavyamasya niyoge' ityuktvā vyaraṃsīt /
GK19bahcar8u:463: abhyarthanāyā rakṣanti ca jalanidhaya iva maryādāmāryāḥ /
GK19bahcar8u:464: dattameva ca śarīramidamanabhyarthitena prathamamevātithyāya mānanīyena bhavatā mhayam /
GK19bahcar8u:465: ataḥ kiñcidarthaye bhadantamiyaṃ naḥ svasā bālā ca bahuduḥkhakheditā ca sarvakāryāvadhīraṇoparodhenāpi yāvallālanīyā nityam /
GK19bahcar8u:468: ato niyuṅktāṃ kiyantamapi kālamātmānamāryo 'pi kārye madīye /
GK19bahcar8u:470: adyaprabhṛti yāvadayaṃ jano laghayati pratijñābhāram, āśvāsayati ca tātavināśaduḥkhaviklavāḥ prajāḥ, tāvadimāmatrabhavataḥ kathābhiśca dharmyābhiḥ, kuśalapratibodhavidhāyibhirupadeśaiśca dūrāpasāritarajobhiḥ,
GK19bahcar8u:473: iyaṃ tu grahīṣyati mayaiva samaṃ samāptakṛtyena kāṣāyāṇi /
GK19bahcar8u:476: muninātho 'pyanapekṣitātmasthitiranukampeti kṛtvā kṛpāvānātmānaṃ vaṭharasattvebhyaḥ katikṛtvo na dattavān /
GK19bahcar8u:477: ataḥ paraṃ bhavanta eva bahutaraṃ jānanti--ityuktvā tūṣṇīṃ babhūva bhūpatiḥ /
GK19bahcar8u:478: bhūyastu babhāṣe bhadantaḥ--”bhavyā na dviruccārayanti vācam /
GK19bahcar8u:480: amunā janena upayogastu nirupayogasyāsya laghuni guruṇi vā kṛtye guṇavadāyattaḥ' iti /
GK19bahcar8u:481: atha tathā tasminnabhinanditapraṇaye prīyamāṇaḥ pārthivastatra tāmuṣitvā vibhāvarīmuṣasi ca vasanālaṅkārādipradānaparitoṣitaṃ visarjya nirghātamācāryeṇa saha svasāramādāya prayāṇakaiḥ katipayaireva kaṭakamanujāhnavi niviṣṭa pratyājagāma /
GK19bahcar8u:482: tatra ca rājyaśrīprāptivyatikarakathāṃ kathayata eva praṇayibhyo ravirapi tatāra gaganatalam
GK19bahcar8u:483: bahalamadhupaṅkapiṅgalaḥ paṅgajākara iva saṃcukoca cakravākavallabho vāsaraḥ prakīrṇaāni navarudhirarasāruṇavarṇāni lokālokajūṃṣi yajūṃṣīva kupitayājñavalkyavaktravāntāni nijavapuṣi pūṣā pāpamūṣi punarapi saṃjahāra
GK19bahcar8u:487: rudrabhikṣādānaśauṇḍapuramathanamuktamuṇḍaśirānāḍirudhirapūraṇaśoṇitakapilaḥ kapālakarpara iva ca paitāmahaḥ, pitṛvadharuṣitarāmarāgaracitaḥ pṛthuvikaṭakārtavīryāṃsakūṭakuṭṭākakuṭhāratuṇḍataṣṭaduṣṭakṣatriyakaṇṭhakuhararudhirakulyāpraṇālasahasrapūrito hrada iva dūrarodhī raudhiro bhayanigūḍhakaracaraṇamuṇḍamaṇḍalākṛtirgurugaruḍanakhapañjarākṣepakṣapaṇakṣiptakṣatajokṣito vyasurvibhāvasuḥ kaṇṭha iva ca loṭhyamānaḥ, nabhasyaruṇagarbhamāṃsapiṇḍa iva ca khaṇjimānamānītaḥ, niyatakālātipātadūyamānadākṣāyaṇīkṣiptaḥ dhātutaṭa iva ca sumerorasuravadhābhicāracarupacanapiśunaḥ śoṇitavkāthakaṣāyitakukṣirativisaṃkaṭaḥ kaṭāha iva ca bārhaspatyaḥ,
GK19bahcar8u:491: samavasite ca saṃdhyāṃsamaye samanantaramaparimitayaśaḥpānatṛṣitāya muktāśailaśilācaṣaka iva
GK19bahcar8u:493: sakaladvīpajigīṣācalitāya śvetadvīpadūta iva cāyatyā, śvetabhānurupānīyata niśayā narendrāyeti bhadramom //
